metadata.Title: CVE-2023-40476 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
[Integer overflow in H.265 video parser leading to stack overwrite]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-40476` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-gst-plugins-bad-1.0 - 1.16.3-0ubuntu1.1
gstreamer1.0-opencv - 1.16.3-0ubuntu1.1
gstreamer1.0-plugins-bad - 1.16.3-0ubuntu1.1
libgstreamer-opencv1.0-0 - 1.16.3-0ubuntu1.1
libgstreamer-plugins-bad1.0-0 - 1.16.3-0ubuntu1.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-bad1.0 package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.16.3-0ubuntu1.1').
